::Zardus/DeathStorm/Shredder::

Zardus and DeathStorm arrive back at the alliance base. "Kill him." Zardus 
tells DeathStorm, indicating Wolfgang. DeathStorm and Zardus open fire on 
Wolfgang.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
(I'm a bit confused. I thought BrightBlade and Gangon ran off.)

Shredder stumbles back as BrightBlade's shots hit him. Diving behind a 
boulder, he fires back at her.
